description: A time of oral tradition, yajnas (sacrifices), and the earliest Sanskrit texts.
artifact_description: Used in fire rituals to offer ghee to the sacred flames.

description: Known for grand architecture and Indo-Persian miniature paintings.
artifact_description: Delicate artwork illustrating court life, love stories, and epics.

description: A blend of tradition and modernity — classical dance, cinema, and technology.
artifact_description: Represents India’s rise as a global cinema powerhouse through Bollywood.
